channel.title: CVE Feed for Bosch -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bosch -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-23848|2024-09-16T16:27:51.671Z -- bosch -- cpp%20firmware
item.description: An error in the URL handler Bosch IP cameras may lead to a reflected cross site scripting (XSS) in the web-based interface. An attacker with knowledge of the camera address can send a crafted link to a user, which will execute javascript code in the context of the user.

item.title: CVE-2020-6787|2024-09-16T16:17:43.323Z -- bosch -- video%20client
item.description: Loading a DLL through an Uncontrolled Search Path Element in the Bosch Video Client installer up to and including version 1.7.6.079 potentially allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code on a victim's system. A prerequisite is that the victim is tricked into placing a malicious DLL in the same directory where the installer is started from.

item.title: CVE-2021-23846|2024-09-16T16:38:12.268Z -- bosch -- b426%C2%A0firmware
item.description: When using http protocol, the user password is transmitted as a clear text parameter for which it is possible to be obtained by an attacker through a MITM attack. This will be fixed starting from Firmware version 3.11.5, which will be released on the 30th of June, 2021.

item.title: CVE-2024-25002|2024-03-25T13:55:15.344Z -- bosch -- network%20synchronizer%20enterprise
item.description: Command Injection in the diagnostics interface of the Bosch Network Synchronizer allows unauthorized users full access to the device.

item.title: CVE-2023-32228|2024-06-04T17:26:31.054Z -- bosch -- ams
item.description: A firmware bug which may lead to misinterpretation of data in the AMC2-4WCF and AMC2-2WCF allowing an adversary to grant access to the last authorized user.

item.title: CVE-2023-32228|2024-08-02T15:10:25.010Z -- bosch -- ams
item.description: A firmware bug which may lead to misinterpretation of data in the AMC2-4WCF and AMC2-2WCF allowing an adversary to grant access to the last authorized user.

item.title: CVE-2024-25002|2024-08-09T16:21:18.523Z -- bosch -- network%20synchronizer%20enterprise
item.description: Command Injection in the diagnostics interface of the Bosch Network Synchronizer allows unauthorized users full access to the device.
